welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Staveley, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its beautiful scenery and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that Staveley has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nottingham Airport is used for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free for a limited time.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at East Midlands Airport handles a high volume of freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration or login.
